name: Word A Ranger
description:
The Park animals are being captured and placed in a cage. As the Ranger on duty we need your help to free these animals. Using your wits and word skills you can release these animals by arranging the letters into new words. The more words you create the more animals you can free.

There are 5 rounds per Word List. You can pick the length per round 60, 90 or 120 seconds.

Click on the top letters and they will move to help form the a new word. If you make a mistake just click on a letter in the new word and it will return to the main word letter area.

If you want to clear all your letters just click on the clear button.

Once you have a new word that you want to submit it for word checking, click on the "Check It" button.

Wrong new words will cause the letters to return to the main word area. Try again.

You will get a bonus of 1 second for each correct letter.

Time will not count down while your word is being checked and your score is being tallied.

The pause button, allows you to pause the game, toggle on and off sound effects and music. It also allows you to exit the game.
